import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import Header from '../components/common/Header' import { getCart } from '../reducks/carts/selectors' import {useSelector, useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {fetchItem} from "../reducks/items/operations" import { fetchCart} from "../reducks/carts/operations" function Orders() { const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(fetchItem()) if (localStorage.getItem("LOGIN_USER_KEY")){ dispatch(fetchCart()) } },[]) const carts = useSelector(getCart) let totalQty =0 console.log(carts) return ( <>
